00055 #ifndef INDRI_REPOSITORY_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_REPOSITORY_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/Parameters.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/Transformation.hpp"
00060 #include <string>
00061 
00065 class Repository {
00066 public:
00067   struct Field {
00068     std::string name;
00069     std::string parserName;
00070     bool numeric;
00071   };
00072 
00073 private:
00074   class IndriIndex* _index;
00075   class CompressedCollection* _collection;
00076   class TopdocsIndex* _topdocs;
00077   Parameters _parameters;
00078   std::vector<Transformation*> _transformations;
00079   std::vector<Field> _fields;
00080 
00081   std::string _path;
00082   bool _readOnly;
00083 
00084   INT64 _memory;
00085 
00086   void _buildFields();
00087   void _buildChain();
00088   void _buildTransientChain( Parameters& parameters );
00089 
00090   void _copyParameters( Parameters& options );
00091 
00092 public:
00093   Repository() {
00094     _index = 0;
00095     _collection = 0;
00096     _readOnly = false;
00097   }
00098 
00099   ~Repository() {
00100     close();
00101   }
00104   void addDocument( ParsedDocument* document );
00106   const std::vector<Field>& fields() const;
00108   std::vector<std::string> tags() const;
00112   std::string processTerm( const std::string& term );
00114   class CompressedCollection* collection();
00116   class IndriIndex* index();
00117   class TopdocsIndex* topdocs();
00121   void create( const std::string& path, Parameters* options = 0 );
00125   void open( const std::string& path, Parameters* options = 0 );
00129   void openRead( const std::string& path, Parameters* options = 0 );
00133   static bool exists( const std::string& path );
00135   void close();
00136 };
